channel.title: About on A blog by RCAP
channel.description: Recent content in About on A blog by RCAP

item.title: Something about this myself
item.description: Hi! My name is Riccardo Cappuzzo, and I’m the author of this blog. I hold a PhD in Computer Science, which I’ve obtained from Sorbonne University after working for three and a half years at EURECOM, in Sophia Antipolis. I’ve been living in the south of France for almost six years now, starting as a student at EURECOM during my Master Degree. I got my Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering from Politecnico di Torino in Turin, then I continued on with a Master degree in Communications and Computer Networks Engineering from the same university.
